Package moulton.scalable.texts

Class Caption

  • java.lang.Object
    • moulton.scalable.utils.MenuComponent
      • moulton.scalable.texts.Caption
  • public class Caption
extends MenuComponent
    A menu component to display text on a panel.
    Author:
    Matthew Moulton

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Alignment alignment
      The alignment of the text to be rendered
      protected java.lang.String centerWidth
      The text will center and draw from x to x+width if specified and alignment is center
      protected java.awt.Color color
      The color of the text to be drawn.
      protected java.awt.Font font
      The font of the text to be rendered
      protected java.lang.String text
      The text to be displayed for this caption.
      protected boolean yCentered
      Whether or not to center the text on the y-axis while rendering.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Caption

        public Caption​(java.lang.String text,
               Panel parent,
               java.lang.String x,
               java.lang.String y,
               java.awt.Font font,
               Alignment alignment)
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display in the menu
        parent - the panel that this caption will reside upon
        x - the x value of the text
        y - the y-value of the center of the text
        font - the font to be used in rendering
        alignment - left, center, or right at the x-value

      • Caption

        public Caption​(java.lang.String text,
               Panel parent,
               java.lang.String x,
               java.lang.String y,
               java.awt.Font font,
               java.lang.String width)
        Parameters:

        parent - the panel that this caption will reside upon
        x - the x value of the text
        y - the y-value of the center of the text
        font - the font to be used in rendering
        width - the text will center and draw from x to x+width

      • Caption

        public Caption​(java.lang.String text,
               Panel parent,
               int x,
               int y,
               java.awt.Font font,
               Alignment alignment)
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display in the menu
        parent - the panel that this caption will reside upon
        x - the integer x coordinate this button should appear on its panel
        y - the integer y coordinate this button should appear on its panel
        font - the font to be used in rendering
        alignment - left, center, or right at the x-value

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render​(java.awt.Graphics g,
                   int xx,
                   int yy,
                   int ww,
                   int hh)
        Description copied from class: MenuComponent
        Draws on the graphics object to represent this component visually. When this method is called, the type of panel storing (grid or free) has been taken into account and the dimensions of the space given to this component have been calculated using MenuComponent.solveString(String, int, int).
        Specified by:
        render in class MenuComponent
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics object to draw on
        xx - the x-position on the graphics image that this component's alloted space begins
        yy - the y-position on the graphics image that this component's alloted space begins
        ww - the width on the graphics image that this component is given
        hh - the height on the graphics image this component is given
